place_descriptions.place_description: Really Great location to hang out in Sabah! Must try it out
Gorgeous place ever in Borneo! Recommend to come here!
Awesome location to travel if you are in this area!
If you come to Borneo, You must come here to try it out, cause here is awesome
I have a wonderful moment here, hope to share to all the travellers who came to Borneo.
Stroongly recommend to hang around here, it would bring you an unforgettable memory
